page.title: 10BURWELL LEARNER POOL
page.content: A new swimming pool is going to be built near the Village College site because an existing school with a pool is closing and so one is required.The {Swimming Pool Committee}is organising the fund raising. The Chairman of the Committee said there has been no opposition to the idea although if they had gone for a really ambitious pool costing Â£60,000 they may well have had some.The smaller{splash pool}will be 5 metres by 7 metres by 0.9 metres and the {big pool}will be 15 metres by 7 metres by 1.4 metres.The big pool will take 130,500 litres or 29,000 gallons.The splash pool will take 27,000 litres or 6,000 gallons.The pool will be{used in {the summer months}by the scool,clubs and the public.Families can also book it privately. It should be{ready}for{summer of 1985.
